title: Golden Worlds Icon
body: Help, i unlocked my Golden worlds icon through hextech crafting and i didn't get it. i got all 10 championship jewels and used my orange essence. i waited a couple days and i still haven't received it. Please help i spent IP and Orange essence on it!

replies.body: It looks like you were able to disenchant your tier 2 icon, which shouldn't have been possible.  I've re-added the icon back to your account.  Thanks for the heads up!
